Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DEFB120 (defensin beta 120, synonyms; DEFB-19, DEFB-20, DEFB-119, UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; human; primates, mammals, animals; BBL)
Sequence Information.Source: pooled fetal lung, testis, B-cell,Homo sapiens

Literature Information.Literature: Predicted as an AMP earlier based on bioinformatic studies (Schutte,B.C., et al. 2002 Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U.S.A. 99 (4), 2129-2133). The current study demonstrated activity against E. coli, S. aureus and C. albicans strains, establishing it as an AMP without hemolytic activity. The original entry neurokinin A has been replaced 5/9/2014 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Liu H1, Yu H, Xin A, Shi H, Gu Y, Zhang Y, Diao H, Lin D.2014
Literature Information.Title: Production and characterization of recombinant human beta-defensin DEFB120.
